did.unittitle: Three Novels of Three Families with Neither Heroes nor Heroines, p. 1-18, incomplete

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes review essay of Rhine Maidens by Carolyn See [Coward, McCann & Geoghegan; 1981], Warlock by Jim Harrison [Delacorte Press/Seymour Lawrence; 1981], and Angel of Light by Joyce Carol Oates [E. P. Dutton; 1981].
